about_the_game:
The Digital Artbook of The Elevator Game with Catgirls, with over 110 pages of content.

Within this artbook you'll find everything from early character design and prototype sketches, to most of the finished assets for the game, along with a gallery of 3D backgrounds, and - of course - a wide variety of development notes. There might also be a couple of secrets from the "backstage", as well as some pieces of fanart made by members of the NoBread team that didn't actively work on the project.

We're always excited to see "behind the scenes" content from games we enjoy, so we dearly hope you'll have a great time going through this artbook yourself.

Please note: The content inside contains major spoilers. It is advised to view the artbook after finishing the game.

Once installed, you'll find the artbook inside your Steam game folder.

We're always excited to see "behind the scenes" content from games we enjoy, so we dearly hope you'll have a great time going through this artbook yourself.
